Order Directing Joint Administration of The Debtors' Chapter 11 Cases Pursuant To Federal Rule of Bankruptcy Procedure 1015(b). An order has been entered to Rule 1015(b) of the Federal Rules of Bankruptcy Procedure directing administration of the following related Chapter 11 Cases: CALIFORNIA PROSPECTORS, LTD.; CARDIVAN COMPANY; CORRAL COIN, INC.; CORRAL COUNTRY COIN, INC.; DAYTON GAMING, INC.; E-T-T, INC.; E-T-T ENTERPRISES, LLC; FLAMINGO PARADISE GAMING, LLC; HERBST GAMING, INC.; HGI LAKESIDE, INC.; MARKET GAMING, INC.; PLANTATION INVESTMENTS, INC.; THE PRIMADONNA COMPANY, LLC.; THE SANDS REGENT; AND ZANTE,INC. The docket in Case No. 09-50746 should be consulted for all matters affecting this case. All further pleadings, motions, and other papers shall be filed in, and all further docket entries shall be made in, Case No. 09-50746-GWZ. (Related document(s) 5 ) (dlm) (Entered: 03/23/2009)
